00020 #ifndef CUSTOM_TYPES
00021 #define CUSTOM_TYPES
00022 
00023 #include <stdlib.h>
00024 
00025 // Neuralynx data types are defined as a custom types (easier to read and maintain)
00026 typedef int16_t   Data;
00027 typedef int64_t   Time;
00028 typedef int32_t   Frequency;
00029 typedef int32_t Coordinates;
00030 
00031 // Constants
00032 #define MAX_N_RESTARTS  512
00033 #define PROGRESS_MAX_N_CHARS    6
00034 // ncs
00035 #define NCS_N_SAMPLES_PER_RECORD 512
00036 #define NCS_MAX_N_CHANNELS 512
00037 #define NCS_FILE_HEADER_SIZE 16*1024
00038 #define NCS_RECORD_HEADER_SIZE 20
00039 #define NCS_MAX_FREQUENCY_ERROR 2 // Allowable error in sampling frequency (Hz)
00040 #define NCS_MAX_OVERLAP 100 // Allowable overlap between successive records (Âµs)
00041 // nvt
00042 #define NVT_FILE_HEADER_SIZE 16*1024
00043 #define NVT_N_TARGETS 50
00044 #define NVT_N_DWPOINTS 400
00045 #define NVT_FRAME_SIZE 1828
00046 #define NVT_MASK_X 4095 // = 2^12-1
00047 #define NVT_MASK_Y 268369920 // = (2^12-1)*2^16
00048 #define NVT_SHIFT_Y 65536 // = (2^12-1)*2^16
00049 #define NVT_MASK_RED 1073741824 // = 2^30
00050 #define NVT_MASK_GREEN 536870912 // = 2^29
00051 #define NVT_MASK_BLUE 268435456 // = 2^28
00052 // nev
00053 #define NEV_FILE_HEADER_SIZE 16*1024
00054 #define NEV_RECORD_SIZE 184
00055 // smi
00056 #define SMI_MAX_N_FILES 512
00057 #define SMI_MATCH_PATTERN "<SYNC"
00058 #define SMI_PATTERN_BEFORE "ENUSCC>"
00059 #define SMI_PATTERN_AFTER "</SYNC>"

00061 #endif
